USE nyc_taxi_ldw;
GO

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS gold.vw_trip_data_green
GO

CREATE VIEW gold.vw_trip_data_green
AS
    SELECT
        
        --result.filename() as file_name,
        result.filepath(1) as year, -- 1 here is Position of WildCard  
        result.filepath(2) as month, -- 2 here is Position of WildCard 
        result.filepath(3) as filename_from_file_path, -- 3 here is Position of WildCard 
        result.*
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK '/gold/trip_data_green/year=*/month=*/*.parquet' ,
            DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src',
            FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
        )WITH(
             borough VARCHAR(15),
             trip_date DATE,
             trip_day VARCHAR(15),
             trip_day_weekend_ind CHAR(1),
             card_trip_count INT,
             cash_trip_count INT
            ) AS [result] 
        
GO


SELECT  year,month,COUNT(1) AS record_count FROM gold.vw_trip_data_green
GROUP BY year,month
ORDER BY 1,2
